Вторая мировая война в цвете Russia

akas from release info: World War II in Colour (original title)
Вторая мировая война в цвете Russia
La II Guerra Mundial en color Spain
World War 2 in HD Colour USA (complete title)

1.title: The Gathering Storm

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: The activities of nations after World War I that lead to World War II.

2.title: Lightning War

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Country after European country falls before the unstoppable German blitzkrieg.

3.title: Britain at Bay

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Germany makes critical errors during the bombing of Britain.

4.title: Hitler Strikes East

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: The German invasion of Russia from Operation Barbarossa on 22 June 1941 to Kursk on 5 July 1943.

5.title: Red Sun Rampant

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Japan attacks the USA on 7 Dec 1941. For the next 6 months, they continue to have successful attacks. However, by the end of the battle for Guadalcanal in Feb 1943, they are completely on the defensive.

6.title: The Mediterranean and North Africa

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: Italy's failed attacks in the Mediterranean region draw in the Germans.

7.title: Turning the Tide

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: Allies turn the tide in the Atlantic, where initially German U-Boats harass freely convoys to supply Britain. The Kriegsmarine calls off their submarines. The route to bring American soldiers who will land on D-Day is clear.

8.title: The Soviet Steamroller

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: Their attack on the Soviet Union having failed, the German Army suffers a series of counter-offensives on the Eastern Front. Hitler's constant orders to stand ground backfire, and the Wehrmacht's losses are huge as the Soviets advance West.

9.title: Overlord

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: After a careful campaign of disinformation that throws the German defenders off-guard, the Western Allies finally land on Normandy. After fierce fighting, they establish a foothold in Europe. France is liberated.

10.title: Closing the Ring

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: The Western Allies secure supply routes that will allow them to enter Germany, and the Ardennes counter-offensive fails. The Red Army advances rapidly, and Stalin shows uses the war for Empire-building. The SS implements the Holocaust.

11.title: The Island War

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: The Marines succeed in the "island hopping" strategy against suicidal resistance. The US Navy establishes supremacy, cutting off Japan. Re-capturing the Phillipines and Burma is costly, but now Japan is fully in the defensive.

12.title: Victory in Europe

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: In 1945, Germany is crumbly on both fronts. The Western Allies cross the Rhine and take most of Germany, while the Red Army quickly advances into Berlin. After Hitler's suicide, Germany surrenders and is divided among the allied powers.

13.title: Victory in the Pacific

episode of.title: World War II in Colour (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: Japan keeps continues its suicidal resistance, and invading it looks costly. After 2 atomic bombs, the Emperor intervenes and stops the War. Stalin grabs territory in East Asia. The War is over, and the Atomic Era and the Cold War start.

imdb.title: World War II in Colour
plot: Recounts the events of world War II in color.
synopsis: A new collection of rare and unseen footage of World War II and the very latest colorization techniques come together in World War II In HD Colour. With satellite-delivered terrain mapping and state-of-the-art graphics, this new series reveals the epic conflict of the 20th century in a fresh light. Narrated by English actor Robert Powell, World War II In HD Colour is a vivid, in-depth experience that provides viewers with new insights and information. Newly divulged documents, files and photographs, code breaking revelations, and recently released government papers on both sides of the Atlantic add a different dimension to our understanding of the strategies and battles of World War II.By using the very latest colorization techniques it is now possible to show the full story of World War II as it has never been fully seen before. Code breaking revelations and newly released government papers on both sides of the Atlantic have added a very insightful new dimension to the understanding of the world's greatest ever conflict. Worldwide television audiences will have the opportunity to view this epic struggle as never before.
